advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes:
Meet version 5.0 of Queue - filled with our top requested new features, a fresh redesign, and more! 

What’s new:

~~ “Explore” ~~

Discover and stay up-to-date with trailers! Scroll a customized “For You” experience with smart suggestions, binge trailers for popular new releases under “Out Now”, know what’s about to drop in “Soon”, or watch the previews for what you can see on the big screen with “In Theaters”

~~ “Watch Guide” ~~

Browse Top 10s, see what’s available on each streaming service and use advanced filters to narrow your search. Easily see what’s moved between each library every month with our new “Recently Added” section!

~~ “Ask AI” ~~

Our AI knows everything in your Queue and Watched lists so we’ll NEVER recommend a title that you’ve already added! Let it help you decide what to watch or discover something new. Pick your favorite emoji and see what it recommends! Powered by ChatGPT

~~ New Badges, UI Refresh, & More ~~

Unlock new badges and experience a crisp new design throughout Queue for a more delightful experience than ever before.

Love Queue? Level up your favorite app and upgrade to Queue+! With Queue+, enjoy the benefits of:

*Custom Posters: Customize the look of your grid and Lists! Change the poster of any movie or show on your Queue and on your updates that are seen by your friends
*Custom App Store icon: Change the icon to a design that matches your home screen aesthetic
*Streak Forgiveness: Lose your streak? Restore it with just one tap! We’ll also restore your ALL-TIME longest week streak when you first sign up for Queue+
*Unlimited Review length: Leave longer reviews and let ‘em know what you *really* think about that movie or show!
*Exclusive Queue+ badges
*Verification: Enjoy a verified check mark so everyone knows you mean business!
*Remove display ads: Who likes ads? Enjoy an ad-free experience.
description:
Do you love watching movies and shows? You've come to the right place. 

Queue is the easiest and most fun way to track your movies and shows, discover new things to watch, see where things are available to stream, and share what you're watching with your friends. 

*See where anything is available to stream, no matter where you are in the world. Queue supports 100+ countries and 200+ streaming services
*Watch trailers - explore a stream of trailers through the Explore tab to see what's new In Theaters, Coming Soon, and Recently Released
*If you've been tracking on your phone what you want to watch, Copy and Paste your list from Notes, spreadsheet, anything, and in seconds it'll appear on your Queue. Upgrade your watchlist!
*Create custom lists to show off your favorites or help keep your organized
*Swipe with a friend to help you agree on something to watch, or swipe alone build up your Queue
*Don't know what to watch? Use the Spinner to help you decide 
*Never miss a movie or series again with notifications to remind you when titles premiere and new seasons air
*Track your series - we have all the air dates for seasons and episodes to help you stay up to date 
*Unlock fun badges through different challenges in the app

Keep in mind we aren't a streaming service - you still need to have access to streaming services in order to watch the movies and shows you discover on Queue. But if you have streaming services like Netflix, Max, Prime Video, Paramount+ and more, you'll love how Queue keeps your organized. Whether you watch on a phone, television, computer, or tablet, Queue is the best companion for watching. Become the most knowledge movie and show person in your friend group without leaving the sofa. 

We’d love to hear from you! We try to respond to all support emails as quickly as possible. Send your questions, feedback, or just say hi at info@queue.co. 

What’s in your Queue? 

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
